column5: I like what I see! They played well defensively, offensively, they were checking, all around great game to watch. Ottawa really played poorly and the defense was invisible. It looked like they were short handed most of the game.lol I feel sorry for Leclaire. Really good goaltender and the best player out there for Ottawa, even though they lost and he let in a cheesy goal.  That Fisher vs Versteeg fight ticked me off! If I was the coach I would have sent Orr to take care of Fisher! We have to protect our good players! I don't mind when the goons fight but that's about it!
They maybe for real this year.Good solid effort.Like they say,whos next?  As for the third period fights and down 4.
I'm surprised that Giguere didn't get a shut out! But he had no chance on that goal.
Yeah sounds like they had a solid game
Leafs win two in a row to start the season. In other news, reports are coming in from astrophysicists around the world that the universe may have suddenly tilted on its axis.
